userStories.title: Fix "Start from Scratch" button not working on macOS
userStories.description:
The "Start from Scratch" button in the New Ticket dropdown does not work on macOS.

## Root Cause Analysis

The `terminal-utils.ts` file only includes Linux terminal emulators in its `ALLOWED_TERMINALS` list. macOS-native terminals are missing:

**Currently supported (cross-platform only):**
- ghostty, alacritty, kitty (would work if installed)
- gnome-terminal, konsole, xfce4-terminal, etc. (Linux only)

**Missing macOS terminals:**
- Terminal.app (built-in macOS terminal)
- iTerm2 (popular third-party terminal)
- Warp (modern terminal)

## Additional Issues

1. **No error feedback** - The code has `// TODO: Show error toast` but errors are only logged to console
2. **GUI app launching** - Even with Ghostty installed, launching GUI apps from a web server process on macOS may have sandbox/permission issues

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Add macOS Terminal.app support using `open -a Terminal` command pattern
- [ ] Add iTerm2 support
- [ ] Add Warp support  
- [ ] Show error toast when terminal launch fails
- [ ] Test on macOS with various terminal configurations
